com.alberto.networkmap

Class NetworkMapDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alberto.networkmap.NetworkMapDataSource

  • public class NetworkMapDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    This class managed the operations with the Database where the network performance map is stored
    Author:
    Alberto García

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close a connection with the database
      boolean existsBWSample(UTMLocation oLocation)
      This method states whether or not exist a row into the table bandwidth_map for the given location
      boolean existsPath(UTMLocation startLocation, UTMLocation endLocation)
      This method states whether or not exist a row into the table paths_bandwidth_map for the transition represented for the given locations
      void insertBWSample(UTMLocation oLocation, float bandwidth)
      This method insert a new network performance sample into the table bandwidth_map

      This method insert a new row in the table paths_bandwidth_map representing a transaction between two locations

      Open a connection with the database

      This method retrieves all the transitions that start in the given location

      This method retrieves the data stored in the table bandwidth_map for the location represented for each parameter that compound a UTM location

      This method retrieves the data stored in the table bandwidth_map for the given location
      Cursor selectMostLikelyPath(UTMLocation startLocation)
      This method retrieves the most likely transition for the starting given location
      Cursor selectPath(UTMLocation startLocation, UTMLocation endLocation)
      This method select the data for the transition stored in the table paths_bandwidth_map
      void updateBWSample(UTMLocation oLocation, float bandwidth)
      This method update a network performance estimate with the info of the new sample into the table bandwidth_map
      void updateProbabilityPath(UTMLocation startLocation, UTMLocation endLocation, float probability)
      This method updates a row of the table paths_bandwidth_map with the new data for the transition represented in that row
      void updateTimesPath(UTMLocation startLocation, UTMLocation endLocation)
      This method updates the field Times into the table paths_bandwidth_map which represents the number of times that a transition between locations has been detected

      • close

        public void close()
        Close a connection with the database

      • insertBWSample

        public void insertBWSample(UTMLocation oLocation,
                  float bandwidth)
        This method insert a new network performance sample into the table bandwidth_map
        Parameters:
        oLocation - The UTMLocation for which the network performance sample was taken
        bandwidth - The network performance sample which is associated with the location

      • updateBWSample

        public void updateBWSample(UTMLocation oLocation,
                  float bandwidth)
        This method update a network performance estimate with the info of the new sample into the table bandwidth_map
        Parameters:
        oLocation - The UTMLocation for which the network performance sample was taken
        bandwidth - The network performance sample which is associated with the location

      • selectBWSample

        public Cursor selectBWSample(UTMLocation oLocation)
        This method retrieves the data stored in the table bandwidth_map for the given location
        Parameters:
        oLocation - The UTMLocation for which the network performance sample is retrieved
        Returns:
        A Cursor which can be used to access the results of the query

      • selectBWSample

        public Cursor selectBWSample(int oZone,
                    java.lang.String oBand,
                    int oUTMe,
                    int oUTMn)
        This method retrieves the data stored in the table bandwidth_map for the location represented for each parameter that compound a UTM location
        Parameters:
        oZone - The location UTM zone
        oBand - The location UTM band
        oUTMe - The location UTM easting
        oUTMn - The location UTM northing
        Returns:
        A Cursor which can be used to access the results of the query

      • insertPath

        public void insertPath(UTMLocation startLocation,
              UTMLocation endLocation,
              float probability)
        This method insert a new row in the table paths_bandwidth_map representing a transaction between two locations
        Parameters:
        startLocation - The UTMLocation where the transition starts
        endLocation - The UTMLocation where the transition ends
        probability - The probability associated to this transition

      • updateProbabilityPath

        public void updateProbabilityPath(UTMLocation startLocation,
                         UTMLocation endLocation,
                         float probability)
        This method updates a row of the table paths_bandwidth_map with the new data for the transition represented in that row
        Parameters:
        startLocation - The UTMLocation where the transition starts
        endLocation - The UTMLocation where the transition ends
        probability - The probability associated to this transition

      • updateTimesPath

        public void updateTimesPath(UTMLocation startLocation,
                   UTMLocation endLocation)
        This method updates the field Times into the table paths_bandwidth_map which represents the number of times that a transition between locations has been detected
        Parameters:
        startLocation - The UTMLocation where the transition starts
        endLocation - The UTMLocation where the transition ends

      • selectPath

        public Cursor selectPath(UTMLocation startLocation,
                UTMLocation endLocation)
        This method select the data for the transition stored in the table paths_bandwidth_map
        Parameters:
        startLocation - The UTMLocation where the transition starts
        endLocation - The UTMLocation where the transition ends
        Returns:
        A Cursor which can be used to access the results of the query

      • selectMostLikelyPath

        public Cursor selectMostLikelyPath(UTMLocation startLocation)
        This method retrieves the most likely transition for the starting given location
        Parameters:
        startLocation - The UTMLocation where the transition starts
        Returns:
        A Cursor which can be used to access the results of the query

      • selectAllPath

        public Cursor selectAllPath(UTMLocation startLocation)
        This method retrieves all the transitions that start in the given location
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A Cursor which can be used to access the results of the query

      • existsBWSample

        public boolean existsBWSample(UTMLocation oLocation)
        This method states whether or not exist a row into the table bandwidth_map for the given location
        Parameters:
        oLocation - The UTMLocation to check the existence of data
        Returns:
        TRUE if there is a row otherwise FALSE

      • existsPath

        public boolean existsPath(UTMLocation startLocation,
                 UTMLocation endLocation)
        This method states whether or not exist a row into the table paths_bandwidth_map for the transition represented for the given locations
        Parameters:
        startLocation - The UTMLocation where the transition starts
        endLocation - The UTMLocation where the transition ends
        Returns:
        TRUE if there is a row otherwise FALSE
